CustomField.description: If unchecked, we do not have permission to sign documents on behalf of clients
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK( LOA_Financial_Account__r.FinServ__JointOwner__c ),
IF( LOA_Financial_Account__r.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__r.Permission_to_sign_documents__c = True, True, False) ,
IF( LOA_Financial_Account__r.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__r.Permission_to_sign_documents__c = True,
IF( LOA_Financial_Account__r.FinServ__JointOwner__r.Permission_to_sign_documents__c = True, True, False)
, False)
)
CustomField.label: Permission to sign documents
